changes_summary: These commits primarily focus on bug fixes and UI enhancements across multiple product areas including pet food subscriptions, gift redemption, and checkout flows. Major work includes reactivation flow improvements, discount banner fixes, and Factor Form migration for price calculations. Several refactoring efforts moved helper functions and reorganized components for better reusability.

features.name: Plans Info Component on Reactivation Page
features.description: Built and integrated plans information component for the reactivation page with Contentful keys

features.name: Food Quantity Disclaimer
features.description: Adds disclaimer for food quantity information

features.name: Frequency Voucher Info in Subscription Card
features.description: Displays frequency voucher information within subscription card component

features.name: GoodChop Gift Redemption Link
features.description: Renders redeem gift link for GoodChop brand in public header using MSS instead of MAS

features.name: Factor Form Price Migration
features.description: Migrated calculate prices functionality to cart and checkout with disabled CTA state and OTP order summary UI updates

features.name: Pet Name in Success Modal
features.description: Uses pet name in the success modal title for personalization

decisions.what: Remove Suspense to disable skeleton display
decisions.rationale: Skeleton display was causing undesired UX behavior

decisions.what: Use MSS instead of MAS for GoodChop
decisions.rationale: Service architecture decision for gift redemption functionality
Improve component architecture and enable reuse across different contexts

decisions.what: Move free treats for life helper functions to test folder
decisions.rationale: Better code organization and separation of test utilities

refactors.area: Free Treats For Life (FTFL) helper functions
refactors.impact: Helper functions moved back to test folder, then refactored

refactors.reason: Enable component reusability across different features
refactors.impact: Component structure reorganized, affecting plan pricing displays

fixes.issue: Statsig track functionality not working correctly

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Analytics tracking system that required fixes

entities.name: GoodChop
entities.context: Brand-specific gift redemption and reactivation e2e configuration

entities.name: Factor Form
entities.context: Undergoing price calculation migration across cart, checkout, and leads capture

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: CMS used for managing content keys for reactivation page

entities.name: MSS/MAS
entities.context: Backend services for subscription management, switched from MAS to MSS for GoodChop

entities.name: Reactivation Flow
entities.context: Multiple improvements including plans info component, cadence fixes, and e2e configuration

entities.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase)
entities.context: Order summary UI updates as part of Factor Form work

key_patterns: Progressive migration pattern: Factor Form changes rolled out incrementally across cart, checkout, and leads capture
Component reusability focus: Multiple refactors aimed at making components more reusable (PlansPrice, helper functions)
Brand-specific configuration: Separate handling for different brands (GoodChop) with dedicated config files
Test maintenance: Active management of failing tests through skipping and e2e configuration
Suspense/loading state management: Removal of Suspense components to control skeleton display behavior
Personalization enhancements: Using dynamic data like pet names in UI elements
Service layer abstraction: Switching between backend services (MSS/MAS) without frontend disruption
